meanings.definition: A large, swift African cat with a yellowish coat and black spots.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah ran across the savannah with incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: I saw a cheetah at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cheetah decided to challenge the gazelle to a race for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her agility on the soccer field was like that of a cheetah hunting its prey.
meanings.sent5: The cheetah's sleek body and powerful legs make it a formidable hunter.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is the fastest or best at something.
meanings.sent1: In the world of swimming, she is a cheetah, always winning races.
meanings.sent2: He is a cheetah when it comes to solving math problems quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cheetah of the office, she finished her work before anyone else.
meanings.sent4: His car was a cheetah on the highway, leaving others far behind.
meanings.sent5: She proved to be a cheetah in the art of negotiation, always getting the best deals.
